generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a large white arrow painted on it, indicating it is a road for vehicles.
- sidewalk: There is a paved sidewalk on the right side of the image, bordered by a curb, where pedestrians are walking.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the street, including commercial storefronts and residential or office buildings.
- wall: A brick wall is visible on the far right side of the image, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible at the intersection, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: A circular "No Parking" sign and a triangular warning sign are visible on the pole with the traffic light.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the street and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing bright and clear.
- person: Multiple pedestrians are visible walking on the road and sidewalk.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle across the road.
- car: Several cars are visible, including a black sedan and a blue SUV.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible being ridden by a person across the road.
